allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add JRE auto-download and fix VMF2OBJ resource path handling

- Auto-download Eclipse Temurin JRE 17 if bundled JRE is missing
- Add adm-zip dependency for zip extraction
- Filter resource paths to only include VPK files and folders with materials/models
- Document VMF2OBJ known bug with extension-less files in CLAUDE.md

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Move model preview to React component and fix file handle issues

- Migrate 900+ line inline model preview template from shared.js to 
  proper React component \(ModelPreviewPage.jsx\) using React Three Fiber
- Add route handling in App.jsx for model-preview window
- Add createModelPreviewWindow\(\) and closeAllModelPreviewWindows\(\) in 
  itemEditor.js following existing window patterns
- Fix EPERM file handle issues:
  - Replace net.fetch with fs.promises.readFile in beep:// protocol
  - Add session.clearCache\(\) before closing preview windows
  - Add clearAllWindowCaches\(\) in packageManager before directory deletion
  - Implement rename-then-delete strategy for locked directories
  - Add cleanupDeletedDirectories\(\) on app startup
- Add mkdirWithRetry\(\) helper with exponential backoff for EPERM/EBUSY
- Fix grid rendering in model preview using THREE.GridHelper

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
